page.title: 15HOW WE SPEND OUR WEEKENDS
page.content: The{weekend}begins by going to the Witley Youth Centre.We go every Friday at 7.00pm.We play games and listen to the jukebox.Soft drinks and food are on sale during the evening.Sometimes roller skate discos are arranged and special dances with a theme such as 'Monsters',when we all dress up.In the summer,we go outside the centre to the recreation ground where we play games of rounders and play on the swings and roundabout.We enjoy Youth Club a lot. On{Saturday}we get on the bus with our friends and go to Godalming,which costs us 53p return.We visit the shops and buy records and magazines.In the evening,we watch television.Our favourite programme is'The A Team'. On{Sundays}we go to church at 9.20am. At Sunday School we paint and make clay models.We finish at 11.20am,then we go home for Sunday roast.Delicious!
